extendedInfo.description: Police Scanner brings you more than 2,500 police, fire, rescue and other radio feeds over 3G or WiFi. You can search for channels in the U.S. and other countries by country, state or province and county. Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G/WiFi triangulation. You can save your favorites, listen in the background, and get instant access to new feeds as they come online. Use Police Scanner to monitor exciting police, fire, and rescue frequencies, stay abreast of these activities in your area, and be prepared for disasters or other emergency situations. â It's like Jersey Shore, but not really. â Whether you like reality shows or hate them, you'll love listening in on real police, fire and rescue communications. Police Scanner Radio brings you more than 2,000 channels including public safety, air traffic, marine and amateur short-wave frequencies, all easily searchable. â Find sources close to you. â When you could hear your neighbors yelling over your own TV, you knew what they were up to. It's when they suddenly got quiet that you had to wonder. No more! With Police Scanner Radio, you'll know as soon as the authorities do! â Never boring! â Find channels with the most activity and listeners. Search U.S. feeds by state and county. Also search international feeds using Police Radio.Roger, Porkchop. Whut's yer 20? Learn new words, and new ways of combining familiar words. We were going to list this in the Education category, but everyone laughed. So here it is in News. Seriously, though, check out the features: Critical Hit Software LLC makes no claim of any kind about the availability of any specific communications channel, frequency or data feed. Feeds are added and removed from time to time outside the control of Critical Hit Software LLC. Please see http://criticalhitsoftware.com/scanner_feeds.php for a sample list of feeds. FEATURES â More than 2,500 radio feeds delivered to you over 3G or WiFi â Simple, intuitive screens â Search U.S. and international channels by country, state and county â Find channels close to your location based on GPS or 3G triangulation â Save your favorite channels â Listen in the background as you use other apps â "10 Codes" and CB Lingo â Get instant access as new feeds come online

reviews.title: Excellent performance.
reviews.comment: Absolutely enjoy this application. I own other proprietary scanners but this one performs excellent and is the one I rely on consistently.
reviews.author: Gregory Lepage

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Great app always aware of what\'s going on near me!!! I love the app good job guys keep it up
reviews.author: Jason Utley

reviews.title: No way to shut down! Invasive!
reviews.comment: Have to stop app manually. This is unacceptable. Upgrade price shown in free app not what I had to pay. Permissions are outrageous. App can modify or delete content of SD memory??? Can read email????
reviews.author: Stuart Sigmond

reviews.title: To many districts on one channel!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m an ex Chicago officer, in good affiliation, and live in the Denver area.  Both of these agencies and all other major municipalities are bunched together!  The areas need to be isolated. RE: Denver PD, Districts 1, 2, 6, 4 PLUS Fire are on one channel!  Chicago has probably 5-7 districts on one. Phoenix just had a multiple shooting event and you cannot decipher anything when the action you want to hear is going on. Please fix this ASAP!
reviews.author: Steve Hampton

reviews.title: Sokieone
reviews.comment: Police scanner radio. Im very pleased with this app.i enjoy being able to get airtraffic control and its clarety.thank you for this app.(sony tipo)
reviews.author: Ian Sokald

reviews.title: Cool way f**king cool
reviews.comment: This app happens to be very good and I don\'t see nothing wrong with it. I LIKE IT!!
reviews.author: Dave Whitney

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Smaller cities and various countries are so much fun. Much better than the portable scanner I use to own. Satisfied.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, works much better...
reviews.comment: This is a great app...had problems with it in the past with it staying on...almost uninstalled it...works much better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, keeps you up to date on all the live action happening in your area. Controls are easy to use , especially if you\'ve never used a scanner before.
reviews.author: David Remy

reviews.title: Nice app but
reviews.comment: It is nice but need to add     channels FL highway patrol and reidsville,NC police
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Works great. Love having the ability to look up the codes right then and there. Great app
reviews.author: Rebecca Reese

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: If you want to know what\'s going on around you and you want the truth instead of with the news teams are saying you will enjoy this scanner hours and hours of fun time Thanks
reviews.author: Robert DeMazeliere

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Awesome to listen to important going ons wherever I travel in a 300 mile radius so I can reroute around rubberneckers and serious incidents.
reviews.author: Greg Spencer

reviews.comment: Works pretty good in my area
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Covers all the Police , Fire and more in your area.  Can go to any state, from where I live, and listen to their Police and Fire + more.  Listened to Boston Police, from my house in Michigan, during entire Boston bombing and while they moved in on 2nd subject and arrested him.                             ,           :
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Need landscape mode tho
reviews.author: Steve Laurenson

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I just love this app. The audio is crystal clear. A+
reviews.author: wenmac Mckoy

reviews.comment: Love this app. I can listen around the country and over seas, not just whats happening around me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I can\'t turn it off
reviews.author: nicci fields

reviews.title: Police Scanner
reviews.comment: Volume needs to be better, but otherwise ok.
reviews.author: Cheryl McFadden
